title: Bug 101187 Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description:
Bug 101187 Localization key can't be blank when adding.

Description: If the key field is left blank when adding a localization, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Add a localization.
2. Leave the key field blank.
3. Save the localization.
4. View the chart.

OB: 

EB: In the properties file, when the key is left blank, it should have a valid value. The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.

SR: 1. Add a localization. 2. Leave the key field blank. 3. Save the localization. 4. View the chart.
